text: I love this game. I may have only been 10 or 11 when I played it, but it left a big impact on me. More so than even Final Fantasy or any other staple in the RPG genre. It's one of the first games that I actually built up over 90 hours of gameplay, and I still play to this day with my original discs. Thanks for uploading this :). Next to the battle theme, this has to be my favorite track in the game!

author: SeijinMahoutsukai

text:
I find this game to be Sakuraba's crowning achievement. A great, varied and inspired soundtrack. This particular dungeon track completely stands out from the rest. He said in a recent interview that he'd like to change it up when it comes to the Tales series' music, but NamcoBandai is limiting him to the usual sound I'm starting to find boring (just like the games themselves, simply trying to clone the great Tales of Symphonia).

Rust Color from SO3 is probably my favorite track of his though.
author: SupraDarky
